Desc.CHS: 少年人的梦想、踏上旅途的兴奋——如果这两种珍贵的品质还不够锋利，那就用勇气补足吧。
Desc.EN: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

Desc.CHS: 能退魔的银剑。大家都知道，其实用料是银合金而不是纯银。
Desc.EN: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

Desc.CHS: 多层锻打的精钢铸就的可靠兵器，曾见证旧主诸多冒险奇谭。
Desc.EN: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或冰元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高12%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或冰元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高15%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 15%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或冰元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高21%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 21%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或冰元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高24%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 一把曾经耀若朝阳的宝剑，掌握它的人会获得「自我感觉良好」的力量加持。剑身上的发光材料已经褪去。
Desc.EN: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

Desc.CHS: 生命值高于90%时，暴击率提升14%。
Desc.EN: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14%.

Desc.CHS: 生命值高于90%时，暴击率提升17.5%。
Desc.EN: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 17.5%.

Desc.CHS: 生命值高于90%时，暴击率提升21%。
Desc.EN: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 21%.

Desc.CHS: 生命值高于90%时，暴击率提升24.5%。
Desc.EN: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 24.5%.

Desc.CHS: 生命值高于90%时，暴击率提升28%。
Desc.EN: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 28%.

Desc.CHS: 趁手的钢剑，剑柄里藏着剪子、放大镜、火绒等方便旅行的小物件。
Desc.EN: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素晶球或元素微粒时，恢复1%生命值。
Desc.EN: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1% HP.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素晶球或元素微粒时，恢复1.25%生命值。
Desc.EN: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.25% HP.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素晶球或元素微粒时，恢复1.5%生命值。
Desc.EN: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.5% HP.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素晶球或元素微粒时，恢复1.75%生命值。
Desc.EN: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.75% HP.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素晶球或元素微粒时，恢复2%生命值。
Desc.EN: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 2% HP.

Desc.CHS: 其实就是稍微有些黑的铁剑。
Desc.EN: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、超导、感电或雷元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高20%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、超导、感电或雷元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高25%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 25% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、超导、感电或雷元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高30%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 30% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、超导、感电或雷元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高35%。

Desc.CHS: 用来剖鱼的锋利铁刀，刀身狭长，非常锋利。
Desc.EN: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

Desc.CHS: 攻击命中时，有50%的概率对单个敌人造成240%攻击力的伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 240% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击命中时，有50%的概率对单个敌人造成280%攻击力的伤害。该效果每14秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 280% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every 14s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击命中时，有50%的概率对单个敌人造成320%攻击力的伤害。该效果每13秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 320% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every 13s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击命中时，有50%的概率对单个敌人造成360%攻击力的伤害。该效果每12秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 360% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击命中时，有50%的概率对单个敌人造成400%攻击力的伤害。该效果每11秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 400% ATK DMG to a single target. Can only occur once every 11s.

Desc.CHS: 可靠的钢剑，传说著名的「御剑公子」曾试图借助它飞天。
Desc.EN: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后，提高12%攻击力和移动速度，持续15秒。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后，提高15%攻击力和移动速度，持续15秒。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 15% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后，提高18%攻击力和移动速度，持续15秒。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 18% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后，提高21%攻击力和移动速度，持续15秒。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 21% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后，提高24%攻击力和移动速度，持续15秒。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 西风骑士团的制式长剑。轻快锐利之余，也能轻易导出元素力量。
Desc.EN: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有60%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每12秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有70%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每10.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 70% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有80%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每9秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 80% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有90%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每7.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 90% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有100%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每6秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

Desc.CHS: 细剑的锈迹下透露出原本华丽的装饰，挥舞时轻若无物。
Desc.EN: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，会获得一个和音。积攒了5个和音后，释放音律的力量，对周围的敌人造成100%攻击力的伤害。和音最多存在30秒，每0.5秒至多获得1个和音。
Desc.EN: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，会获得一个和音。积攒了5个和音后，释放音律的力量，对周围的敌人造成125%攻击力的伤害。和音最多存在30秒，每0.5秒至多获得1个和音。
Desc.EN: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 125% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Desc.EN: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 150% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Desc.EN: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 175% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，会获得一个和音。积攒了5个和音后，释放音律的力量，对周围的敌人造成200%攻击力的伤害。和音最多存在30秒，每0.5秒至多获得1个和音。
Desc.EN: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 200% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 在漫长岁月中石化的道具剑，上面的仪式性装饰依然清晰可见。拥有受时间之风冲刷的祝福力量。
Desc.EN: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有40%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有70%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每19秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 19s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有80%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每16秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 16s.

Desc.CHS: 曾支配蒙德的旧日贵族的佩剑。做工精良，装饰与雕花彰显着挥舞者的身份。
Desc.EN: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升8%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升10%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 10%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 雕饰浮华的利刃，却丝毫不损它的柔韧与锋锐。破空之声有如龙吟。
Desc.EN: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高20%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 20%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高24%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高28%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 28%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高32%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 32%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高36%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 36%.

Desc.CHS: 黑岩厂中秘藏的古老长剑。可挥砍断岩而刃不卷。
Desc.EN: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，攻击力和防御力提高4%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，攻击力和防御力提高5%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，攻击力和防御力提高6%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，攻击力和防御力提高7%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 7% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击或重击命中时，攻击力和防御力提高8%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 外形流利的细长刺剑，是从异国经由商路流落到璃月的奇异兵器。轻快无比，剑芒极其锐利。
Desc.EN: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

Desc.CHS: 造成元素伤害后的6秒内，角色造成的伤害提高6%，该效果最多叠加2层。该效果每1秒可以触发一次。
Desc.EN: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

Desc.CHS: 造成元素伤害后的6秒内，角色造成的伤害提高7.5%，该效果最多叠加2层。该效果每1秒可以触发一次。
Desc.EN: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 7.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

Desc.CHS: 造成元素伤害后的6秒内，角色造成的伤害提高9%，该效果最多叠加2层。该效果每1秒可以触发一次。
Desc.EN: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

Desc.CHS: 造成元素伤害后的6秒内，角色造成的伤害提高10.5%，该效果最多叠加2层。该效果每1秒可以触发一次。
Desc.EN: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 10.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

Desc.CHS: 造成元素伤害后的6秒内，角色造成的伤害提高12%，该效果最多叠加2层。该效果每1秒可以触发一次。
Desc.EN: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

Desc.CHS: 黑岩锻造而成的长剑。玄色的剑身隐隐流露血光。
Desc.EN: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升12%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升15%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升18%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升21%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升24%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 渴求着纷争与砍杀的漆黑长剑，据说会让人沉醉在浴血厮杀的亢奋中。
Desc.EN: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的造成的伤害提升20%；此外，普通攻击与重击暴击时，回复等同于攻击力60%的生命值。该效果每5秒至多发动一次。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%. Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的造成的伤害提升25%；此外，普通攻击与重击暴击时，回复等同于攻击力70%的生命值。该效果每5秒至多发动一次。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 25%. Additionally, regenerates 70% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的造成的伤害提升30%；此外，普通攻击与重击暴击时，回复等同于攻击力80%的生命值。该效果每5秒至多发动一次。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, regenerates 80% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的造成的伤害提升35%；此外，普通攻击与重击暴击时，回复等同于攻击力90%的生命值。该效果每5秒至多发动一次。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 35%. Additionally, regenerates 90% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的造成的伤害提升40%；此外，普通攻击与重击暴击时，回复等同于攻击力100%的生命值。该效果每5秒至多发动一次。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 40%. Additionally, regenerates 100% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Desc.CHS: 有着黑夜颜色的笔直长剑，曾属于穿行于暗巷的盗贼。
Desc.EN: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.

Desc.CHS: 角色造成的伤害提升12%。受到伤害后，该伤害提升效果会失效5秒。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 角色造成的伤害提升15%。受到伤害后，该伤害提升效果会失效5秒。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 15%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 角色造成的伤害提升18%。受到伤害后，该伤害提升效果会失效5秒。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 18%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 角色造成的伤害提升21%。受到伤害后，该伤害提升效果会失效5秒。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 21%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 角色造成的伤害提升24%。受到伤害后，该伤害提升效果会失效5秒。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 24%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 造型独特的剑。看起来并不属于这个世界。
Desc.EN: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.

Desc.CHS: 仅在以下平台生效：\n"PlayStation Network"\n普通攻击与重击命中敌人后有50%概率在小范围内造成200%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒只能触发一次；此外，旅行者装备降临之剑时，攻击力提升66点。
Desc.EN: Effective only on the following platform: \n"PlayStation Network"\nHitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

Desc.CHS: 希冀着生命的诡谲直剑，附有连龙也能侵蚀的腐殖之毒。
Desc.EN: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害增加16%，元素战技的暴击率提升6%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害增加20%，元素战技的暴击率提升7.5%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 20% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 7.5%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害增加24%，元素战技的暴击率提升9%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 24% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 9%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害增加28%，元素战技的暴击率提升10.5%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 28% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 10.5%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害增加32%，元素战技的暴击率提升12%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 12%.

Desc.CHS: 传说中连以神速见长的天狗都能斩落的名士订制的刀。
Desc.EN: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，获得1个胤种，该效果每5秒至多触发一次。胤种持续30秒，至多同时存在3个。施放元素爆发后，会清除持有的所有胤种，并在2秒之后，基于消耗的胤种数量，每个为该角色恢复6点元素能量。
Desc.EN: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates 6 Energy for each seed consumed.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，获得1个胤种，该效果每5秒至多触发一次。胤种持续30秒，至多同时存在3个。施放元素爆发后，会清除持有的所有胤种，并在2秒之后，基于消耗的胤种数量，每个为该角色恢复7.5点元素能量。

Desc.CHS: 由不似这个世界的物质制成的剑，其中的力量就连侵蚀龙的腐殖之毒也能抵御住吧。
Desc.EN: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的40%。该效果每1.5秒最多触发一次，并将在元素战技造成伤害后的0.1秒后清除效果。
Desc.EN: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 40% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的50%。该效果每1.5秒最多触发一次，并将在元素战技造成伤害后的0.1秒后清除效果。

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的60%。该效果每1.5秒最多触发一次，并将在元素战技造成伤害后的0.1秒后清除效果。
Desc.EN: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 60% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

Desc.EN: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 80% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

Desc.CHS: 西风骑士团的灵魂。历经千年仍在呼唤你卷起正义之风，祓除奸邪，一如上一位挥舞此剑的女杰。
Desc.EN: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高20%；受到伤害时触发：高扬抗争旗号的西风鹰之魂苏醒，恢复等同于攻击力的100%的生命值，并对周围的敌人造成200%攻击力的伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: ATK is increased by 20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100% of ATK and dealing 200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高25%；受到伤害时触发：高扬抗争旗号的西风鹰之魂苏醒，恢复等同于攻击力的115%的生命值，并对周围的敌人造成230%攻击力的伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: ATK is increased by 25%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 115% of ATK and dealing 230% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高30%；受到伤害时触发：高扬抗争旗号的西风鹰之魂苏醒，恢复等同于攻击力的130%的生命值，并对周围的敌人造成260%攻击力的伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: ATK is increased by 30%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 130% of ATK and dealing 260% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高35%；受到伤害时触发：高扬抗争旗号的西风鹰之魂苏醒，恢复等同于攻击力的145%的生命值，并对周围的敌人造成290%攻击力的伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: ATK is increased by 35%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 145% of ATK and dealing 290% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高40%；受到伤害时触发：高扬抗争旗号的西风鹰之魂苏醒，恢复等同于攻击力的160%的生命值，并对周围的敌人造成320%攻击力的伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: ATK is increased by 40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 160% of ATK and dealing 320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 象征风龙的荣誉的骑士剑，如今失而复得。剑脊上吹息着风之神的赐福，蕴含苍空与长风的力量。
Desc.EN: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

Desc.CHS: 暴击率提升4%；施放元素爆发时，获得破空之势：移动速度提升10%，攻击速度提升10%，普通攻击与重击命中时，额外造成20%攻击力的伤害，持续12秒。
Desc.EN: CRIT Rate increased by 4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 20% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击率提升5%；施放元素爆发时，获得破空之势：移动速度提升10%，攻击速度提升10%，普通攻击与重击命中时，额外造成25%攻击力的伤害，持续12秒。
Desc.EN: CRIT Rate increased by 5%, Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 25% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击率提升6%；施放元素爆发时，获得破空之势：移动速度提升10%，攻击速度提升10%，普通攻击与重击命中时，额外造成30%攻击力的伤害，持续12秒。
Desc.EN: CRIT Rate increased by 6%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 30% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击率提升7%；施放元素爆发时，获得破空之势：移动速度提升10%，攻击速度提升10%，普通攻击与重击命中时，额外造成35%攻击力的伤害，持续12秒。
Desc.EN: CRIT Rate increased by 7%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 35% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击率提升8%；施放元素爆发时，获得破空之势：移动速度提升10%，攻击速度提升10%，普通攻击与重击命中时，额外造成40%攻击力的伤害，持续12秒。
Desc.EN: CRIT Rate increased by 8%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 40% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 如同悠古的歌声一般苍蓝的直剑，如同风之国土自由的誓言一般锐利的武器。
Desc.EN: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.

Desc.CHS: 飘游风中的「千年的大乐章」的一部分。造成的伤害提高10%；触发元素反应时，角色获得一枚奋起之符，每0.5秒内至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台也能触发。拥有2枚奋起之符时，将消耗所有奋起之符，使附近的队伍中所有角色获得持续12秒的「千年的大乐章·抗争之歌」效果：普通攻击、重击、下落攻击造成的伤害提高16%，攻击力提升20%。触发后20秒内，无法再次获得奋起之符。「千年的大乐章」触发的多种数值效果中，同类数值效果不可叠加。
Desc.EN: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by 10%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by 16% and increases ATK by 20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Desc.CHS: 飘游风中的「千年的大乐章」的一部分。造成的伤害提高12.5%；触发元素反应时，角色获得一枚奋起之符，每0.5秒内至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台也能触发。拥有2枚奋起之符时，将消耗所有奋起之符，使附近的队伍中所有角色获得持续12秒的「千年的大乐章·抗争之歌」效果：普通攻击、重击、下落攻击造成的伤害提高20%，攻击力提升25%。触发后20秒内，无法再次获得奋起之符。「千年的大乐章」触发的多种数值效果中，同类数值效果不可叠加。

This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by 28% and increases ATK by 35%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Desc.CHS: 飘游风中的「千年的大乐章」的一部分。造成的伤害提高20%；触发元素反应时，角色获得一枚奋起之符，每0.5秒内至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台也能触发。拥有2枚奋起之符时，将消耗所有奋起之符，使附近的队伍中所有角色获得持续12秒的「千年的大乐章·抗争之歌」效果：普通攻击、重击、下落攻击造成的伤害提高32%，攻击力提升40%。触发后20秒内，无法再次获得奋起之符。「千年的大乐章」触发的多种数值效果中，同类数值效果不可叠加。
Desc.EN: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by 20%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by 32% and increases ATK by 40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Desc.CHS: 传说中象征着某一则特定契约的利刃，曾经斩落过山岳的尖端。
Desc.EN: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升20%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升4%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升25%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升5%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 25%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 5% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 30%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 6% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 35%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 7% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升40%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升8%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 由纯净的翠玉精琢细雕而成的仪礼宝剑，挥舞时剑风中似有叹息之声。
Desc.EN: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

Desc.CHS: 生命值提升20%。此外，基于装备该武器的角色生命值上限的1.2%，获得攻击力加成。
Desc.EN: HP increased by 20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2% of the wielder's Max HP.

Desc.CHS: 生命值提升25%。此外，基于装备该武器的角色生命值上限的1.5%，获得攻击力加成。
Desc.EN: HP increased by 25%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.5% of the wielder's Max HP.

Desc.CHS: 生命值提升30%。此外，基于装备该武器的角色生命值上限的1.8%，获得攻击力加成。
Desc.EN: HP increased by 30%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.8% of the wielder's Max HP.

Desc.CHS: 生命值提升35%。此外，基于装备该武器的角色生命值上限的2.1%，获得攻击力加成。
Desc.EN: HP increased by 35%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 2.1% of the wielder's Max HP.

Desc.CHS: 生命值提升40%。此外，基于装备该武器的角色生命值上限的2.4%，获得攻击力加成。
Desc.EN: HP increased by 40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 2.4% of the wielder's Max HP.

Desc.CHS: 闪烁着凄烈紫光的太刀。名之为「回光」是因为一度破碎的过去。
Desc.EN: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.

Desc.CHS: 获得12%所有元素伤害加成，并能获得「雾切之巴印」的威势。雾切之巴印：持有1/2/3层雾切之巴印时，获得8/16/28%自己的元素类型的元素伤害加成。在下列情况下，角色将各获得1层雾切之巴印：普通攻击造成元素伤害时，持续5秒；施放元素爆发时，持续10秒；此外，角色元素能量低于100%时，将获得1层雾切之巴印，此雾切之巴印会在角色的元素能量充满时消失。每层雾切之巴印的持续时间独立计算。
Desc.EN: Gain a 12% Elemental DMG Bonus for all elements and receive the might of the Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Desc.CHS: 获得15%所有元素伤害加成，并能获得「雾切之巴印」的威势。雾切之巴印：持有1/2/3层雾切之巴印时，获得10/20/35%自己的元素类型的元素伤害加成。在下列情况下，角色将各获得1层雾切之巴印：普通攻击造成元素伤害时，持续5秒；施放元素爆发时，持续10秒；此外，角色元素能量低于100%时，将获得1层雾切之巴印，此雾切之巴印会在角色的元素能量充满时消失。每层雾切之巴印的持续时间独立计算。

At stack levels 1/2/3, the Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 10/20/35% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Desc.CHS: 仅仅是削出了剑形的厚重铁片。在意志强韧的人手里，也有劈开磐石的力量。
Desc.EN: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

Desc.CHS: 沉重坚实的古旧大剑，饱经战火与岁月的洗练。
Desc.EN: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

Desc.CHS: 这把剑是著名的光之狮艾伦德林的佩剑的仿品。握紧它，感受传说中大英雄的力量吧！注意：幻想请适度。
Desc.EN: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

Desc.CHS: 生命值低于70%时，重击不会轻易被打断，并提高30%重击伤害。
Desc.EN: When HP falls below 70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

Desc.CHS: 生命值低于75%时，重击不会轻易被打断，并提高35%重击伤害。
Desc.EN: When HP falls below 75%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

Desc.CHS: 生命值低于80%时，重击不会轻易被打断，并提高40%重击伤害。
Desc.EN: When HP falls below 80%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 40% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

Desc.CHS: 生命值低于85%时，重击不会轻易被打断，并提高45%重击伤害。
Desc.EN: When HP falls below 85%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 45% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

Desc.CHS: 生命值低于90%时，重击不会轻易被打断，并提高50%重击伤害。
Desc.EN: When HP falls below 90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

Desc.CHS: 据说是北方英雄浸过龙血的钢铁大剑，有刀枪不入的神力…这种护佑并不会延伸到挥舞它的人身上。
Desc.EN: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高12%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高15%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 15%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高18%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 18%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高21%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 21%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于火元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高24%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 白铁锻成的双手剑，兼顾了重量与强度。即使臂力一般的人也能舞得生风，在力量强大者手中更是威力无穷。
Desc.EN: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复8%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复10%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 10% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复12%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 12% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复14%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 14% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复16%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 16% HP.

Desc.CHS: 古朴厚重的大剑，由坚固的黑色石英雕琢打磨而成，上面有着鎏金的花纹，尽显优雅庄严。
Desc.EN: A simple but heavy greatsword made of polished black quartz with a golden gilt. It has an air of elegance and dignity about it.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、融化、点燃、蒸发或火元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高20%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、融化、点燃、蒸发或火元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高25%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 25% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、融化、点燃、蒸发或火元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高30%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 30% for 12s.

Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 35% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 触发超载、融化、点燃、蒸发或火元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高40%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 40% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 精钢打造的趁手大铁棒子。最好的理论依据。
Desc.EN: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击命中时会在小范围内额外造成60%攻击力的伤害。该效果持续15秒，伤害每3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 60% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击命中时会在小范围内额外造成75%攻击力的伤害。该效果持续15秒，伤害每3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 75% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击命中时会在小范围内额外造成90%攻击力的伤害。该效果持续15秒，伤害每3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 90% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击命中时会在小范围内额外造成105%攻击力的伤害。该效果持续15秒，伤害每3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 105% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击命中时会在小范围内额外造成120%攻击力的伤害。该效果持续15秒，伤害每3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 120% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

Desc.CHS: 可靠的大剑。传说著名的「御剑公子」曾试图借助它二度飞天。
Desc.EN: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，攻击力提高6%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，攻击力提高7%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 7% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，攻击力提高8%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，攻击力提高9%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 9% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，攻击力提高10%，持续6秒，最多叠加4层。该效果每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 西风骑士团的重型仪式剑。能轻易导出元素力量，具有卓越的破坏力。
Desc.EN: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有60%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每12秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有70%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每10.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 70% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有80%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每9秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 80% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有90%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每7.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 90% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.

Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

Desc.CHS: 装有时钟的厚重大剑，其中的计时机关早已被破坏。
Desc.EN: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

Desc.CHS: 受到伤害时，生成一个伤害吸收量等同于生命值上限20%的护盾，持续10秒或直到护盾失效,每45秒只能触发一次。角色处于护盾庇护下时，造成的伤害提升12%。
Desc.EN: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains 12% increased DMG.

Desc.CHS: 受到伤害时，生成一个伤害吸收量等同于生命值上限23%的护盾，持续10秒或直到护盾失效,每45秒只能触发一次。角色处于护盾庇护下时，造成的伤害提升15%。
Desc.EN: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 23% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains 15% increased DMG.

Desc.EN: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 26% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains 18% increased DMG.

Desc.EN: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 29% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains 21% increased DMG.

Desc.CHS: 受到伤害时，生成一个伤害吸收量等同于生命值上限32%的护盾，持续10秒或直到护盾失效,每45秒只能触发一次。角色处于护盾庇护下时，造成的伤害提升24%。
Desc.EN: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 32% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains 24% increased DMG.

Desc.CHS: 在漫长岁月中石化的道具大剑，上面的仪式性装饰依然清晰可见。拥有受时间之风冲刷的祝福力量。
Desc.EN: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有40%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有50%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每26秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 26s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有60%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每22秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 22s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有70%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每19秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 19s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有80%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每16秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 16s.

Desc.CHS: 曾支配蒙德的旧日贵族的大剑。用料极佳，历久犹弥新。是贵族的战斗兵器。
Desc.EN: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by the nobility only.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升8%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升10%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 10%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升12%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 12%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升14%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 14%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升16%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 散发着黯淡荧光的无锋大剑，纯粹以气势和力量碾碎敌人。
Desc.EN: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高20%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高24%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高28%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 28%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高32%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 32%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高36%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 36%.

Desc.CHS: 黑岩厂中秘藏的古老大刀。挥舞时，仿佛连空间本身也要被一刀两断。
Desc.EN: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，有50%的概率对小范围内的敌人造成240%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，有50%的概率对小范围内的敌人造成300%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 300% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，有50%的概率对小范围内的敌人造成360%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 360% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，有50%的概率对小范围内的敌人造成420%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 420% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中时，有50%的概率对小范围内的敌人造成480%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 480% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 剑身上有一面未开刃的异国大剑，经商路流落到璃月。在了解它的人手里，破坏力极可观。
Desc.EN: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中后，攻击力和防御力提高6%。该效果持续6秒，最多叠加4层，每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中后，攻击力和防御力提高7.5%。该效果持续6秒，最多叠加4层，每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 7.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中后，攻击力和防御力提高9%。该效果持续6秒，最多叠加4层，每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 9% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中后，攻击力和防御力提高10.5%。该效果持续6秒，最多叠加4层，每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 10.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击和重击命中后，攻击力和防御力提高12%。该效果持续6秒，最多叠加4层，每0.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

Desc.CHS: 坚韧无比的黑岩大刀，通体皆为玄赤之色。
Desc.EN: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升12%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升15%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升18%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升21%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升24%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 来自古代大海的稀有兵器，舞剑猎猎宛如太古的涛声。
Desc.EN: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

Desc.CHS: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升6%造成的伤害，3%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。
Desc.EN: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

Desc.CHS: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升7%造成的伤害，2.7%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。
Desc.EN: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 7% more DMG and take 2.7% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

Desc.CHS: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升8%造成的伤害，2.4%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。
Desc.EN: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 8% more DMG and take 2.4% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

Desc.CHS: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升9%造成的伤害，2.2%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。
Desc.EN: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 9% more DMG and take 2.2% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

Desc.CHS: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升10%造成的伤害，2%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。
Desc.EN: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 10% more DMG and take 2% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

Desc.CHS: 以璃月的基岩为原料削凿成的厚重大剑。
Desc.EN: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备该武器的角色便获得7%攻击力提升与3%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7% ATK increase and a 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备该武器的角色便获得8%攻击力提升与4%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 8% ATK increase and a 4% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备该武器的角色便获得9%攻击力提升与5%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 9% ATK increase and a 5% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备该武器的角色便获得10%攻击力提升与6%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 10% ATK increase and a 6% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备该武器的角色便获得11%攻击力提升与7%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 11% ATK increase and a 7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 储存在壁画之间的古老大剑。由星银铸成，似乎拥有斩开冰雪的力量。
Desc.EN: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有60%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成80%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成200%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 80% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 200% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有70%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成95%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成240%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 70% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 95% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 240% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有80%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成110%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成280%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has an 80% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 110% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 280% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有90%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成125%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成320%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 90% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 125% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 320% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有100%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成140%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成360%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 140% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 360% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 海中的大王。经过风干，是称手的兵器以及应急食品。
Desc.EN: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.

Desc.CHS: 元素爆发造成的伤害提升12%。元素爆发命中敌人时，有100%概率召唤大鲔冲击，造成100%攻击力的范围伤害。该效果每15秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 12%. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals 100% ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

Desc.CHS: 元素爆发造成的伤害提升15%。元素爆发命中敌人时，有100%概率召唤大鲔冲击，造成125%攻击力的范围伤害。该效果每15秒至多触发一次。

Desc.CHS: 过去在踏鞴砂打造的刀，沉重而坚韧。
Desc.EN: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害提升6%。元素战技命中后，角色流失3点元素能量，并在此后的6秒内，每2秒恢复3点元素能量。该效果每10秒至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台也能触发。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

Desc.CHS: 传说中「恶王」的爱刀，刀身庞大雄伟，但挥舞起来却出乎意料地轻便。
Desc.EN: The beloved sword of the legendary "Akuou." The blade is huge and majestic, but is surprisingly easy to wield.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中所有角色的元素能量上限的总和，每1点能使装备此武器的角色的元素爆发造成的伤害提高0.12%，通过这种方式，元素爆发造成的伤害至多提高40%。
Desc.EN: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12%. A maximum of 40% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Desc.CHS: 象征风龙的骄傲广布长空的双手剑。挥舞时的低吟是风龙的气势，蕴含苍空与长风的力量。
Desc.EN: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

Desc.CHS: 造成的伤害提高8%；施放元素爆发后：普通攻击和重击命中时会发出真空刃，对路径上的敌人造成80%攻击力的伤害，持续20秒或直至发出8次真空刃。
Desc.EN: Increases all DMG by 8%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Desc.CHS: 造成的伤害提高10%；施放元素爆发后：普通攻击和重击命中时会发出真空刃，对路径上的敌人造成100%攻击力的伤害，持续20秒或直至发出8次真空刃。
Desc.EN: Increases all DMG by 10%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 100% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Desc.EN: Increases all DMG by 16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 160% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Desc.CHS: 狼的骑士所使的大剑。原本只是城中铁匠赠予的厚重的铁片，却在他与狼的情谊中，获得神话般的力量。
Desc.EN: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高20%；攻击命中生命值低于30%的敌人时，队伍中所有成员的攻击力提高40%，持续12秒。该效果30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高25%；攻击命中生命值低于30%的敌人时，队伍中所有成员的攻击力提高50%，持续12秒。该效果30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases ATK by 25%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 50% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高30%；攻击命中生命值低于30%的敌人时，队伍中所有成员的攻击力提高60%，持续12秒。该效果30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases ATK by 30%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 60% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高35%；攻击命中生命值低于30%的敌人时，队伍中所有成员的攻击力提高70%，持续12秒。该效果30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases ATK by 35%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 70% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.EN: Increases ATK by 40%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 如同翻弄草木的息吹一般轻盈的大剑，如同吹倒树木的飓风一般摧枯拉朽的武器。
Desc.EN: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.

Desc.CHS: 飘游风中的「千年的大乐章」的一部分。攻击力提高16%；普通攻击或重击命中敌人时，角色获得一枚低语之符，每0.3秒内至多触发一次。拥有4枚低语之符时，将消耗所有低语之符，使附近的队伍中所有角色获得持续12秒的「千年的大乐章·揭旗之歌」效果：普通攻击速度提高12%，攻击力提升20%。触发后20秒内，无法再次获得低语之符。「千年的大乐章」触发的多种数值效果中，同类数值效果不可叠加。
Desc.EN: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by 16%, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by 12% and increases ATK by 20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Desc.CHS: 能靖祛妖魔奸佞，仿佛有神威的无锋大剑。
Desc.EN: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升20%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升4%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升25%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升5%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 25%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 5% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升30%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升6%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 30%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 6% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升35%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升7%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 35%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 7% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升40%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升8%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 依据过去的主人的说法，这是何等鬼怪精妖都能打跑的大杵「赤角石见石溃金涂金啮御狮子」。
Desc.EN: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.

Desc.CHS: 防御力提高28%；普通攻击与重击造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的40%。
Desc.EN: DEF is increased by 28%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 40% of DEF.

Desc.CHS: 防御力提高35%；普通攻击与重击造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的50%。
Desc.EN: DEF is increased by 35%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 50% of DEF.

Desc.CHS: 防御力提高42%；普通攻击与重击造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的60%。
Desc.EN: DEF is increased by 42%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 60% of DEF.

Desc.CHS: 防御力提高49%；普通攻击与重击造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的70%。
Desc.EN: DEF is increased by 49%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 70% of DEF.

Desc.CHS: 防御力提高56%；普通攻击与重击造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的80%。
Desc.EN: DEF is increased by 56%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 80% of DEF.

Desc.CHS: 笔直得像旗杆一般的长枪，挥舞起来颇具气势。足以应付大多数情况。
Desc.EN: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

Desc.CHS: 一头有尖，可攻可守的护身武器。在旅者当中十分流行。
Desc.EN: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

Desc.CHS: 千岩军士兵的制式装备，枪身牢靠，枪尖锋锐，是无比可靠的武器。
Desc.EN: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升24%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升30%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 30%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升36%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 36%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升42%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 42%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升48%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 48%.

Desc.CHS: 在矛上增加斧刃的兵器，有不俗的破坏力。是千岩军军官青睐的武器。
Desc.EN: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

Desc.CHS: 对普通攻击命中的敌人造成160%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160% ATK as DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 对普通攻击命中的敌人造成200%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attacks deal an additional 200% ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 对普通攻击命中的敌人造成240%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attacks deal an additional 240% ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 对普通攻击命中的敌人造成280%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attacks deal an additional 280% ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 对普通攻击命中的敌人造成320%攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attacks deal an additional 320% ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 解决了白缨容易弄脏问题的绝世好枪。
Desc.EN: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

Desc.CHS: 对史莱姆类敌人造成的伤害增加40%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against slimes by 40%.

Desc.CHS: 对史莱姆类敌人造成的伤害增加50%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against slimes by 50%.

Desc.CHS: 对史莱姆类敌人造成的伤害增加60%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against slimes by 60%.

Desc.EN: Increases DMG against slimes by 70%.

Desc.EN: Increases DMG against slimes by 80%.

Desc.CHS: 备用
Desc.EN: Reserve

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复8%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复10%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 10% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复12%生命值。

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复14%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 14% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复16%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 16% HP.

Desc.CHS: 金龙缠绕的长枪，轻快锐利无比。大抵真能轻易屠龙。
Desc.EN: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或火元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高20%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或火元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高24%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 24%.

Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 28%.

Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 32%.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或火元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高36%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 36%.

Desc.CHS: 黑岩厂中秘藏的古老钩枪。锋芒上点点的闪光有如夜空稀星。
Desc.EN: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击造成的伤害提高8%。该效果持续12秒，最多叠加2层。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击造成的伤害提高10%。该效果持续12秒，最多叠加2层。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击造成的伤害提高12%。该效果持续12秒，最多叠加2层。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击造成的伤害提高14%。该效果持续12秒，最多叠加2层。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 14% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击造成的伤害提高16%。该效果持续12秒，最多叠加2层。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 16% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 枪尖狭长，尾部分出半月刀刃的异国兵器，经由商路流落到璃月。稍事练习掌握，便有极其出众的杀伤力。
Desc.EN: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素微粒或元素晶球后的5秒内，普通攻击和重击额外造成20%攻击力伤害。
Desc.EN: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 20% of ATK for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素微粒或元素晶球后的5秒内，普通攻击和重击额外造成25%攻击力伤害。
Desc.EN: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 25% of ATK for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素微粒或元素晶球后的5秒内，普通攻击和重击额外造成30%攻击力伤害。
Desc.EN: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 30% of ATK for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素微粒或元素晶球后的5秒内，普通攻击和重击额外造成35%攻击力伤害。
Desc.EN: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 35% of ATK for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 获得元素微粒或元素晶球后的5秒内，普通攻击和重击额外造成40%攻击力伤害。
Desc.EN: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 40% of ATK for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 以黑岩与陨铁铸成的兵器，玄锋清凛的光泽中仿佛隐隐可见血色。
Desc.EN: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升12%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升15%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升18%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升21%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升24%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 血红色的锋利长枪，过去是某位角斗士无比珍视的宝物。枪芒上曾沾染了无数野兽与人的鲜血。
Desc.EN: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

Desc.CHS: 身边至少有2个敌人时，获得16%攻击力提升与16%防御力提升；身边的敌人少于2个时，获得24%攻击力提升。
Desc.EN: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16% and DEF is increased by 16%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 身边至少有2个敌人时，获得20%攻击力提升与20%防御力提升；身边的敌人少于2个时，获得30%攻击力提升。
Desc.EN: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 20% and DEF is increased by 20%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 30%.

Desc.CHS: 身边至少有2个敌人时，获得24%攻击力提升与24%防御力提升；身边的敌人少于2个时，获得36%攻击力提升。
Desc.EN: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24% and DEF is increased by 24%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 36%.

Desc.CHS: 身边至少有2个敌人时，获得28%攻击力提升与28%防御力提升；身边的敌人少于2个时，获得42%攻击力提升。
Desc.EN: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 28% and DEF is increased by 28%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 42%.

Desc.CHS: 身边至少有2个敌人时，获得32%攻击力提升与32%防御力提升；身边的敌人少于2个时，获得48%攻击力提升。
Desc.EN: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 32% and DEF is increased by 32%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 48%.

Desc.CHS: 取孤云阁的岩片精工打造的长枪，枪尖坚固无比。
Desc.EN: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备此武器的角色便获得7%攻击力提升与3%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7% ATK increase and a 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备此武器的角色便获得8%攻击力提升与4%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 8% ATK increase and a 4% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备此武器的角色便获得9%攻击力提升与5%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 9% ATK increase and a 5% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备此武器的角色便获得10%攻击力提升与6%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 10% ATK increase and a 6% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中每有一位璃月角色，装备此武器的角色便获得11%攻击力提升与7%暴击率提升。至多获得4层提升效果。
Desc.EN: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 11% ATK increase and a 7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Desc.CHS: 西风骑士团的制式长枪。枪杆直挺，枪尖轻风流溢。
Desc.EN: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有60%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每12秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有70%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每10.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 70% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有80%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每9秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 80% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有90%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每7.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 90% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有100%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每6秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

Desc.CHS: 某位曾支配蒙德的旧日贵族，曾经珍爱的长枪。过去不曾见过天日，但如今依然尖锐无比。
Desc.EN: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升8%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升10%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 10%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升12%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 12%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升14%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 14%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升16%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 利用龙之牙制成的长枪。有着奇异的温暖触感。
Desc.EN: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有60%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成80%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成200%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 80% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 200% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有70%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成95%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成240%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 70% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 95% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 240% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有80%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成110%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成280%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has an 80% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 110% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 280% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有90%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成125%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成320%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 90% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 125% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 320% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有100%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成140%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成360%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 140% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 360% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 曾经在八酝岛守望「祟神」的枪法名士所用的特殊长枪。
Desc.EN: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害提升6%。元素战技命中后，角色流失3点元素能量，并在此后的6秒内，每2秒恢复3点元素能量。该效果每10秒至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台也能触发。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成的伤害提升7.5%。元素战技命中后，角色流失3点元素能量，并在此后的6秒内，每2秒恢复3.5点元素能量。该效果每10秒至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台也能触发。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 7.5%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3.5 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

Desc.EN: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

Desc.EN: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中所有角色的元素能量上限的总和，每1点能使装备此武器的角色的元素爆发造成的伤害提高0.12%，通过这种方式，元素爆发造成的伤害至多提高40%。

Desc.EN: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

Desc.EN: HP increased by 20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional 1% of Max HP.

Desc.CHS: 象征风龙坚定决心的长枪。直挺的枪杆直指天穹，蕴含苍空与长风的力量。
Desc.EN: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

Desc.CHS: 暴击率提升8%，普通攻击速度提升12%。此外，普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有50%概率触发真空刃，在小范围内造成额外40%攻击力的伤害。该效果每2秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases CRIT Rate by 8% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Desc.CHS: 或许能贯穿一切的锋利长枪。挥舞当中，仿佛能见到空气被枪尖划破的裂痕。
Desc.EN: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.EN: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

Desc.EN: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

Desc.CHS: 精心编纂，只留下考试重点的魔导参考小册。
Desc.EN: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

Desc.CHS: 第十二版。结合时代发展加注了新内容，并修订了第十一版的错别字。
Desc.EN: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或雷元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高12%。

Desc.EN: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

Desc.CHS: 主动切换角色时，新登场的角色攻击力提升24%，持续10秒。该效果每20秒只能触发一次。

Desc.CHS: 获得元素微粒或元素晶球时，恢复2%生命值。
Desc.EN: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 2% HP.

Desc.CHS: 由璃月北郊绝云间出产的硬玉雕琢而成的法器。小巧轻盈，经久耐用，江湖人称「翡玉丸」。
Desc.EN: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."

Desc.CHS: 触发蒸发、感电、冰冻或水元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高20%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 触发蒸发、感电、冰冻或水元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高25%。
Desc.EN: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 25% for 12s.

Desc.EN: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 35% for 12s.

Desc.EN: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 40% for 12s.

Desc.CHS: 两块玉石拼成的精致玉佩。
Desc.EN: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后的15秒内，移动速度和攻击力提升12%。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12% for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后的15秒内，移动速度和攻击力提升14%。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 14% for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后的15秒内，移动速度和攻击力提升16%。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 16% for 15s.
