Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 18% for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后的15秒内，移动速度和攻击力提升20%。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 20% for 15s.

Desc.CHS: 用琥珀雕磨制成的法器，在日照下会散发出温暖的光晕。
Desc.EN: A catalyst carved out of amber that gains a warm halo under the sun.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后，获得6%元素伤害加成。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后，获得7.5%元素伤害加成。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 7.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后，获得9%元素伤害加成。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后，获得10.5%元素伤害加成。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 10.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后，获得12%元素伤害加成。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 西风骑士团的学者间流传的秘典，记载着元素与物质的道理和力量。
Desc.EN: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有60%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每12秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有70%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每10.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 70% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有80%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每9秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 80% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有90%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每7.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 90% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有100%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每6秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

Desc.CHS: 记载着歌谱的厚重记事簿。尽管遭受了虫蛀和风化，残留的手迹仍透露出力量。
Desc.EN: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

Desc.CHS: 角色登场时，随机获得一个主题曲，持续10秒。每30秒只能触发一次。宣叙调：攻击力提升60%；咏叹调：全元素伤害提升48%;间奏曲：元素精通提升240。
Desc.EN: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240.

Desc.CHS: 角色登场时，随机获得一个主题曲，持续10秒。每30秒只能触发一次。宣叙调：攻击力提升75%；咏叹调：全元素伤害提升60%;间奏曲：元素精通提升300。
Desc.EN: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 75%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 60%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 300.

Desc.CHS: 角色登场时，随机获得一个主题曲，持续10秒。每30秒只能触发一次。宣叙调：攻击力提升90%；咏叹调：全元素伤害提升72%;间奏曲：元素精通提升360。
Desc.EN: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 90%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 72%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 360.

Desc.CHS: 角色登场时，随机获得一个主题曲，持续10秒。每30秒只能触发一次。宣叙调：攻击力提升105%；咏叹调：全元素伤害提升84%;间奏曲：元素精通提升420。
Desc.EN: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 105%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 84%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 420.

Desc.CHS: 角色登场时，随机获得一个主题曲，持续10秒。每30秒只能触发一次。宣叙调：攻击力提升120%；咏叹调：全元素伤害提升96%;间奏曲：元素精通提升480。
Desc.EN: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 120%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 96%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 480.

Desc.CHS: 经历漫长岁月的剧本，记载着的颂词和剧本已经无法辨认。被下了受时间之风侵蚀毁坏的诅咒。
Desc.EN: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有40%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有50%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每26秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 26s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有60%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每22秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 22s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有70%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每19秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 19s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有80%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每16秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 16s.

Desc.CHS: 属于曾支配蒙德的贵族麾下的宫廷魔导师，其中记载的史话与法术同样翔实。
Desc.EN: A book that once belonged to a court mage of Mondstadt who served the nobility. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升8%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升10%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 10%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 12%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 14%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 材质难解的暗金宝珠，饱含日月天地的光辉，脉动着温暖的力量。
Desc.EN: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后的6秒内，元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高20%；元素战技与元素爆发命中后的6秒内，普通攻击的伤害提高20%。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 6s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后的6秒内，元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高25%；元素战技与元素爆发命中后的6秒内，普通攻击的伤害提高25%。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 25% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 25% for 6s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后的6秒内，元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高30%；元素战技与元素爆发命中后的6秒内，普通攻击的伤害提高30%。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 30% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 30% for 6s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后的6秒内，元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高35%；元素战技与元素爆发命中后的6秒内，普通攻击的伤害提高35%。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 35% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 35% for 6s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中后的6秒内，元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高40%；元素战技与元素爆发命中后的6秒内，普通攻击的伤害提高40%。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 40% for 6s.

Desc.CHS: 黑岩厂中秘藏的金珀法器。其中黯黯绽放着日月星光。
Desc.EN: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后6秒内，每2秒恢复4点元素能量，队伍中的所有角色每2秒恢复4%生命值。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后6秒内，每2秒恢复4.5点元素能量，队伍中的所有角色每2秒恢复4.5%生命值。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4.5 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4.5% HP every 2s for this duration.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后6秒内，每2秒恢复5点元素能量，队伍中的所有角色每2秒恢复5%生命值。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 5 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 5% HP every 2s for this duration.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后6秒内，每2秒恢复5.5点元素能量，队伍中的所有角色每2秒恢复5.5%生命值。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 5.5 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 5.5% HP every 2s for this duration.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素爆发后6秒内，每2秒恢复6点元素能量，队伍中的所有角色每2秒恢复6%生命值。
Desc.EN: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 6 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 6% HP every 2s for this duration.

Desc.CHS: 详尽记载了大陆周边海流气候的海图，是从异国经由商路流落到璃月的奇异典籍。
Desc.EN: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

Desc.CHS: 触发元素反应后的10秒内，获得8%元素伤害加成，该效果最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 触发元素反应后的10秒内，获得10%元素伤害加成，该效果最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 10% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 触发元素反应后的10秒内，获得12%元素伤害加成，该效果最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 12% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 触发元素反应后的10秒内，获得14%元素伤害加成，该效果最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 14% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 触发元素反应后的10秒内，获得16%元素伤害加成，该效果最多可以叠加2层。
Desc.EN: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 16% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

Desc.CHS: 由黑岩制成的神秘法器，无常的赤色闪光仿佛大地深处的悸动同调。
Desc.EN: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升12%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升15%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升18%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升21%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升24%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 幽暗的琉璃宝珠，传说中拥有洞察人心清白的力量。
Desc.EN: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率发射一枚昭心法球，造成240%攻击力伤害，至多在敌人之间弹射4次。该效果每12秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率发射一枚昭心法球，造成270%攻击力伤害，至多在敌人之间弹射4次。该效果每11秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 270% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 11s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率发射一枚昭心法球，造成300%攻击力伤害，至多在敌人之间弹射4次。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 300% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率发射一枚昭心法球，造成330%攻击力伤害，至多在敌人之间弹射4次。该效果每9秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 330% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 9s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率发射一枚昭心法球，造成360%攻击力伤害，至多在敌人之间弹射4次。该效果每8秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 8s.

Desc.CHS: 过去贵族时代流行的歌谱，作者已无从考究。其中记载了某位侠盗的故事…
Desc.EN: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中敌人后，冲刺或替代冲刺的能力消耗的体力降低14%，持续5秒。此外，使用冲刺或替代冲刺的能力后，攻击力提升20%，持续5秒。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by 14% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by 20% for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中敌人后，冲刺或替代冲刺的能力消耗的体力降低16%，持续5秒。此外，使用冲刺或替代冲刺的能力后，攻击力提升25%，持续5秒。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by 16% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by 25% for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 具有某种冰冷意志的奇特果实，散发着微弱的苦涩气息。
Desc.EN: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有60%概率在敌人上方生成恒冰晶核并坠落，造成80%攻击力的范围伤害。若敌人处于冰元素影响下，则造成200%攻击力的伤害。该效果每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 80% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 200% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 一本封面华丽的童书，内容皆是童言无忌的短小故事，读之令人忍俊不禁。\n即使业已成年的读者，读到书中天真无邪的冒险故事，也会忍不住神往吧。
Desc.EN: A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot help but laugh.\nEven those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbed by the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中敌人后的6秒内，重击造成的伤害提升16%；重击命中敌人后的6秒内，攻击力提升8%。

Desc.CHS: 承载着过去的「狐斋宫」思念的法器。但她的思念之大，是无法完全装进这样小小的器物当中的。
Desc.EN: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

Desc.CHS: 装备该武器的角色触发雷元素相关反应后，队伍中附近的与该元素反应相关的元素类型的角色，获得10%对应元素的元素伤害加成，持续6秒。通过这种方式，角色获得的元素伤害加成无法叠加。
Desc.EN: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a 10% Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

Desc.CHS: 象征风龙与其主风之神的云图集。细致记载了北地天空的风与云，蕴含苍空与长风的力量。
Desc.EN: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

Desc.CHS: 元素伤害加成提升12%；普通攻击命中时，有50%的概率获得高天流云的青睐，在15秒内主动攻击附近的敌人，造成等同于160%攻击力的伤害。该效果每30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing 160% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

Name.EN: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

Desc.CHS: 崇信风的无名先民所写的教典珍本。数千年流传的信仰之力得到了风的青睐，饱含祝福与力量。
Desc.EN: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

Desc.CHS: 移动速度提高10%；在场上每4秒获得8%元素伤害加成。该效果最多叠加4层，持续直到角色倒下或离场。
Desc.EN: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

Desc.CHS: 蕴含着某种悠远记忆的石锁，随着无穷的变换透露出其中的力量。
Desc.EN: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

Desc.CHS: 护盾强效提升20%。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升4%。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 出自深海的美玉之环，闪烁着清澈如月的光泽，一如遥远往昔。
Desc.EN: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

Desc.CHS: 治疗加成提升10%；普通攻击造成的伤害增加，增加值为装备该武器的角色生命值上限的1%。在施放元素爆发后的12秒内，普通攻击命中敌人时恢复0.6点元素能量，每0.1秒至多通过这种方式恢复一次元素能量。
Desc.EN: Healing Bonus increased by 10%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by 1% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

Desc.CHS: 猎手演奏的音乐由两种音色组成。弓弦颤动的声音，和羽箭破空的低啸。
Desc.EN: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

Desc.CHS: 饱经磨炼又精心护养的弓，经历了漫长的岁月。仿佛会主动配合射手的动作一般好使。
Desc.EN: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

Desc.CHS: 相传渡鸦是死的使者。将鸦羽装饰在弓臂上，射出的每一箭都宣告着猎物的终末。
Desc.EN: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

Desc.CHS: 对处于水元素或火元素影响下的敌人，造成的伤害提高12%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12%.

Desc.CHS: 据说曾属于技艺高强的射手，是一把上好的弓。因为散发出强烈的气息，难以用于狩猎。
Desc.EN: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

Desc.EN: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 针对要害造成的伤害提升42%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against weak spots by 42%.

Desc.CHS: 针对要害造成的伤害提升48%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against weak spots by 48%.

Desc.CHS: 据说能射下苍鹰的猎弓，但能不能做到主要还得看弓手的技术。
Desc.EN: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复8%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复10%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 10% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复12%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 12% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复14%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 14% HP.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人时，恢复16%生命值。
Desc.EN: Defeating an opponent restores 16% HP.

Desc.CHS: 其实就是一把弓。在无数的改进和实验中，发明出究极弹弓的人发现自己做了一把弓。
Desc.EN: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的箭矢若在发射后的0.3秒内击中敌人，则造成的伤害增加36%；否则，造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的箭矢若在发射后的0.3秒内击中敌人，则造成的伤害增加42%；否则，造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 42%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的箭矢若在发射后的0.3秒内击中敌人，则造成的伤害增加48%；否则，造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 48%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击的箭矢若在发射后的0.3秒内击中敌人，则造成的伤害增加54%；否则，造成的伤害下降10%。

Desc.EN: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 60%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 造型简单的木制弓。传说它曾被人用作远程通讯的道具。
Desc.EN: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则额外造成100%攻击力的伤害，该伤害必定暴击。此效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则额外造成125%攻击力的伤害，该伤害必定暴击。此效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 125% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则额外造成150%攻击力的伤害，该伤害必定暴击。此效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 150% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则额外造成175%攻击力的伤害，该伤害必定暴击。此效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 175% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则额外造成200%攻击力的伤害，该伤害必定暴击。此效果每10秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 用檀木制成的长弓，弓臂比寻常木材硬。因此力量也更大。
Desc.EN: A longbow made of ebony wood with stiffer limbs than ordinary bows. It is also a far more powerful weapon.

Desc.CHS: 对遗迹机关类敌人：造成的伤害提高40%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by 40%.

Desc.CHS: 对遗迹机关类敌人：造成的伤害提高50%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by 50%.

Desc.CHS: 对遗迹机关类敌人：造成的伤害提高60%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by 60%.

Desc.CHS: 对遗迹机关类敌人：造成的伤害提高70%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by 70%.

Desc.CHS: 对遗迹机关类敌人：造成的伤害提高80%。
Desc.EN: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by 80%.

Desc.CHS: 西风骑士团的制式反曲弓，只有杰出的弓手能与它的杰出性能相衬。
Desc.EN: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有60%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每12秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有70%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每10.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 70% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有80%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每9秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 80% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有90%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每7.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 90% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成暴击时，有100%的几率产生少量元素微粒，能为角色恢复6点元素能量。该效果每6秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: CRIT Hits have a 100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

Desc.CHS: 曾经作为乐器大放异彩的弓。如今已经不再能令人起舞。
Desc.EN: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高24%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高30%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 30%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高36%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 36%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高42%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 42%.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技与元素爆发的伤害提高48%。
Desc.EN: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 48%.

Desc.CHS: 在漫长岁月中石化的道具猎弓，上面的仪式性装饰依然清晰可见。拥有受时间之风冲刷的祝福力量。
Desc.EN: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有40%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每30秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有50%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每26秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 26s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有60%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每22秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 22s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有70%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每19秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 19s.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技造成伤害时，有80%的概率重置该技能的冷却时间，该效果每16秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 16s.

Desc.CHS: 曾支配蒙德的旧日贵族的长弓。经过无数世代，弓弦仍十分有力，击发迅猛。
Desc.EN: An old longbow that belonged to the erstwhile aristocratic rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升8%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升10%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 10%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升12%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 12%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升14%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 14%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 攻击造成伤害时，暴击率提升16%，最多堆叠5次。攻击造成暴击后，移除已有的专注效果。
Desc.EN: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Desc.CHS: 布满锈迹的铁造大弓，一般人根本拿不动，遑论引弓放矢。
Desc.EN: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升40%，重击造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升50%，重击造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 50% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升60%，重击造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 60% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升70%，重击造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 70% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升80%，重击造成的伤害下降10%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 80% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Desc.CHS: 黑岩厂中秘藏的原型长弓。放矢之姿有如透过薄暮的月光。
Desc.EN: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则提升10%移动速度与36%攻击力，持续10秒。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36% for 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则提升10%移动速度与45%攻击力，持续10秒。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 45% for 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则提升10%移动速度与54%攻击力，持续10秒。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 54% for 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则提升10%移动速度与63%攻击力，持续10秒。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 63% for 10s.

Desc.CHS: 重击若命中要害，则提升10%移动速度与72%攻击力，持续10秒。
Desc.EN: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 72% for 10s.

Desc.CHS: 以金属制成，用滑轮引弦的复合弓，来自异国。护养极其困难，但引弓轻松，威力惊人。
Desc.EN: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，提升4%攻击力与1.2%普通攻击速度。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加4层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，提升5%攻击力与1.5%普通攻击速度。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加4层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 5% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，提升6%攻击力与1.8%普通攻击速度。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加4层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 6% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，提升7%攻击力与2.1%普通攻击速度。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加4层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 7% and Normal ATK SPD by 2.1% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，提升8%攻击力与2.4%普通攻击速度。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加4层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 8% and Normal ATK SPD by 2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Desc.CHS: 以黑岩塑成的弓。弓臂坚硬无比，只有膂力绝人的弓手才能尽心所欲地使用。
Desc.EN: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升12%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升15%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升18%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升21%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升24%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
Desc.EN: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Desc.CHS: 高洁的青绿猎弓，曾属于在林间狩猎的某人。
Desc.EN: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率生成一个风之眼，持续吸引周围敌人，并对其中的敌人每0.5秒造成40%攻击的伤害。该效果持续4秒，每14秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 40% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率生成一个风之眼，持续吸引周围敌人，并对其中的敌人每0.5秒造成50%攻击的伤害。该效果持续4秒，每13秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 50% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 13s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率生成一个风之眼，持续吸引周围敌人，并对其中的敌人每0.5秒造成60%攻击的伤害。该效果持续4秒，每12秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 60% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 12s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率生成一个风之眼，持续吸引周围敌人，并对其中的敌人每0.5秒造成70%攻击的伤害。该效果持续4秒，每11秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 70% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 11s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击命中时，有50%几率生成一个风之眼，持续吸引周围敌人，并对其中的敌人每0.5秒造成80%攻击的伤害。该效果持续4秒，每10秒至多触发一次。
Desc.EN: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 80% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

Desc.CHS: 外形精巧奢华的长弓，曾属于某位从未被抓获的义贼。
Desc.EN: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

Desc.CHS: 装备该武器的角色处于队伍后台时，每1秒角色造成的伤害提升2%，最多通过这种方式获得20%的伤害提升；在场上超过4秒后，上述伤害提升效果每1秒会流失4%，直到降低至0%。
Desc.EN: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2% every second up to a max of 20%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4% per second until it reaches 0%.

Desc.CHS: 装备该武器的角色处于队伍后台时，每1秒角色造成的伤害提升2.5%，最多通过这种方式获得25%的伤害提升；在场上超过4秒后，上述伤害提升效果每1秒会流失5%，直到降低至0%。
Desc.EN: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2.5% every second up to a max of 25%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 5% per second until it reaches 0%.

Desc.CHS: 装备该武器的角色处于队伍后台时，每1秒角色造成的伤害提升3%，最多通过这种方式获得30%的伤害提升；在场上超过4秒后，上述伤害提升效果每1秒会流失6%，直到降低至0%。
Desc.EN: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 3% every second up to a max of 30%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 6% per second until it reaches 0%.

Desc.CHS: 装备该武器的角色处于队伍后台时，每1秒角色造成的伤害提升3.5%，最多通过这种方式获得35%的伤害提升；在场上超过4秒后，上述伤害提升效果每1秒会流失7%，直到降低至0%。
Desc.EN: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 3.5% every second up to a max of 35%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 7% per second until it reaches 0%.

Desc.CHS: 装备该武器的角色处于队伍后台时，每1秒角色造成的伤害提升4%，最多通过这种方式获得40%的伤害提升；在场上超过4秒后，上述伤害提升效果每1秒会流失8%，直到降低至0%。
Desc.EN: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 4% every second up to a max of 40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 8% per second until it reaches 0%.

Desc.CHS: 有着如同罪与幻想之夜一般颜色的弓。
Desc.EN: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中敌人后的5秒内，元素战技造成的伤害提升20%；元素战技命中敌人后的5秒内，普通攻击造成的伤害提升20%。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 20% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击命中敌人后的5秒内，元素战技造成的伤害提升25%；元素战技命中敌人后的5秒内，普通攻击造成的伤害提升25%。
Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 25% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 25% for 5s.

Desc.EN: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 40% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 40% for 5s.

Desc.CHS: 点缀以无名花朵的弓，承载着同样无名之人的殷切希望。
Desc.EN: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.

Desc.CHS: 施放元素战技时，获得风之花的悠古愿望加持，攻击力提升16%，持续6秒。
Desc.EN: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by 16% for 6s.

Desc.CHS: 曾经属于某个巫女的战弓。以优越的技法打造，精巧而耐用。
Desc.EN: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升16%，重击造成的伤害提升12%。当装备该武器的角色元素能量等于100%时，这个效果提升100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 16% and Charged Attack DMG by 12%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击造成的伤害提升20%，重击造成的伤害提升15%。当装备该武器的角色元素能量等于100%时，这个效果提升100%。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 20% and Charged Attack DMG by 15%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.EN: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 32% and Charged Attack DMG by 24%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

Desc.CHS: 设计风格相当独特的弓，应该不属于这个世界。
Desc.EN: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.

Desc.CHS: 仅在以下平台生效：\n"PlayStation Network"\n对敌人造成冰元素伤害后，普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提高10%，该效果持续6秒，至多叠加2次；此外，埃洛伊装备掠食者时，攻击力提升66点。
Desc.EN: Effective only on the following platform: \n"PlayStation Network"\nDealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

Desc.CHS: 出自螺钿与珊瑚的精美战弓，月色的弓臂上流动着凄然的光彩。
Desc.EN: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中所有角色的元素能量上限的总和，每1点能使装备此武器的角色的元素爆发造成的伤害提高0.12%，通过这种方式，元素爆发造成的伤害至多提高40%。
Desc.EN: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12%. A maximum of 40% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中所有角色的元素能量上限的总和，每1点能使装备此武器的角色的元素爆发造成的伤害提高0.15%，通过这种方式，元素爆发造成的伤害至多提高50%。
Desc.EN: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.15%. A maximum of 50% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中所有角色的元素能量上限的总和，每1点能使装备此武器的角色的元素爆发造成的伤害提高0.18%，通过这种方式，元素爆发造成的伤害至多提高60%。
Desc.EN: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.18%. A maximum of 60% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Desc.CHS: 队伍中所有角色的元素能量上限的总和，每1点能使装备此武器的角色的元素爆发造成的伤害提高0.21%，通过这种方式，元素爆发造成的伤害至多提高70%。
Desc.EN: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.21%. A maximum of 70% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Desc.EN: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.24%. A maximum of 80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Desc.CHS: 象征风龙身为风之神眷属的大弓。释弦时的鸣声是风之神的偏爱，蕴含苍空与长风的力量。
Desc.EN: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

Desc.CHS: 暴击伤害提高20%；攻击命中时有60%概率造成125%攻击力的小范围物理伤害，该效果每4秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases CRIT DMG by 20%. Hits have a 60% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击伤害提高25%；攻击命中时有70%概率造成125%攻击力的小范围物理伤害，该效果每3.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases CRIT DMG by 25%. Hits have a 70% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 3.5s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击伤害提高30%；攻击命中时有80%概率造成125%攻击力的小范围物理伤害，该效果每3秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases CRIT DMG by 30%. Hits have a 80% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 3s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击伤害提高35%；攻击命中时有90%概率造成125%攻击力的小范围物理伤害，该效果每2.5秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases CRIT DMG by 35%. Hits have a 90% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 2.5s.

Desc.CHS: 暴击伤害提高40%；攻击命中时有100%概率造成125%攻击力的小范围物理伤害，该效果每2秒只能触发一次。
Desc.EN: Increases CRIT DMG by 40%. Hits have a 100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 2s.

Desc.CHS: 极为古老的弓。即使原主不复存在，其中蕴藏之力依旧——那种力量无主，却在万物当中。距离心系之物越是遥远，那种力量愈是剧烈。
Desc.EN: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提升12%；普通攻击与重击的箭矢发射后每经过0.1秒，伤害还会提升8%，至多提升5次。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提升15%；普通攻击与重击的箭矢发射后每经过0.1秒，伤害还会提升10%，至多提升5次。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 15%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 10% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提升18%；普通攻击与重击的箭矢发射后每经过0.1秒，伤害还会提升12%，至多提升5次。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 18%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 12% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提升21%；普通攻击与重击的箭矢发射后每经过0.1秒，伤害还会提升14%，至多提升5次。
Desc.EN: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 21%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 14% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

Desc.CHS: 普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提升24%；普通攻击与重击的箭矢发射后每经过0.1秒，伤害还会提升16%，至多提升5次。

Desc.CHS: 如同诗人的乐器一般优美的弓，放出的箭矢如同叹息声一般穿透人心。
Desc.EN: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.

Desc.CHS: 飘游风中的「千年的大乐章」的一部分。元素精通提高60点；元素战技或元素爆发命中敌人时，角色获得一枚追思之符，每0.2秒内至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台也能触发。拥有4枚追思之符时，将消耗所有追思之符，使附近的队伍中所有角色获得持续12秒的「千年的大乐章·别离之歌」效果：元素精通提高100点，攻击力提升20%。触发后20秒内，无法再次获得追思之符。「千年的大乐章」触发的多种数值效果中，同类数值效果不可叠加。
Desc.EN: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by 60. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by 100 and increases ATK by 20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Desc.CHS: 如同深冬坚冰一样尖锐的无垢之弓。
Desc.EN: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

Desc.CHS: 元素战技和元素爆发造成的伤害提高12%；普通攻击、重击、元素战技或元素爆发命中敌人后，将产生1层持续12秒的「白夜极星」效果。处于1/2/3/4层「白夜极星」效果下时，攻击力将提高10/20/30/48%。由普通攻击、重击、元素战技或元素爆发产生的「白夜极星」将分别独立存在。
Desc.EN: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 12%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by 10/20/30/48%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

Desc.CHS: 曾由将军御赐的长弓，闪烁着永不熄灭的雷光。
Desc.EN: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.

Desc.CHS: 攻击力提高20%，并能获得「飞雷之巴印」的威势。飞雷之巴印：持有1/2/3层飞雷之巴印时，普通攻击造成的伤害提高12/24/40%。在下列情况下，角色将各获得1层飞雷之巴印：普通攻击造成伤害时，持续5秒；施放元素战技时，持续10秒；此外，角色元素能量低于100%时，将获得1层飞雷之巴印，此飞雷之巴印会在角色的元素能量充满时消失。每层飞雷之巴印的持续时间独立计算。
Desc.EN: Increases ATK by 20% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by 12/24/40%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.
